title: Service Details
about: We are a team of 2 experienced workers with expertise in Plastering, Painting, Tiling, Waterproofing, POP Work. We provide our own tools and are available for projects of any size in and around Srinagar.

reviews.name: Farooq A.
reviews.text: Excellent work! The team was punctual, professional, and completed the job ahead of schedule. Highly recommended.

reviews.name: Mehreen B.
reviews.text: Very efficient and respectful team. My kitchen renovation was done perfectly.

title: Service Details
about: We are a team of 4 experienced workers with expertise in Roofing, Gutter Installation, Metal Roofing, Tile Roofing, Roof Repair. We provide our own tools and are available for projects of any size in and around Srinagar.

reviews.name: Imran N.
reviews.text: Work was okay, but there were some delays in completing the project.

reviews.name: Farooq A.
reviews.text: Excellent work! The team was punctual, professional, and completed the job ahead of schedule. Highly recommended.

title: Service Details
about: We are a team of 5 experienced workers with expertise in Brick Laying, Stone Work, Concrete Structures, Traditional Architecture, Foundation Work. We provide our own tools and are available for projects of any size in and around Srinagar.

reviews.name: Sameer K.
reviews.text: Good quality work for my house foundation. They were knowledgeable and skilled. Would hire again.

reviews.name: Mehreen B.
reviews.text: Very efficient and respectful team. My kitchen renovation was done perfectly.
